body.name: Type C Port Dash Cam Hardwire Kit iiwey 13ft 12V 24V to 5V Mini Hard Wire Kit Fuse for Dashcam, Micro Car Dash Camera Charger Power Cord with LP/Mini/ATO/Micro2 Fuse for Dash Cam, GPS Navigator

features: 【Wide Compatible】Input:12V-24V; Output:5V/2A(also fits for 1A). With Mini ,Micro and Type-C three kind of USB ports, this hardwire kit compatible with all of dash cams. (Fit for brand:iiwey, ORSKEY, Claoner, APEMAN, Peztio, Innosinpo and so on, but not fits for all Garmin devices!)

【Low Voltage Protection】Come with a sensitive voltage sensing switch, it will monitor the car battery voltage in real time. Once the voltage is lower than 11.4V, it will cut the power supply, leaving enough power to ignite the engine
【24-Hour Power On】Makes the parking monitor of your dash cam work! Keeps it powered even after engine off, protect your car all day!
【Shielding Magnetic Ring Included】Your car radio will be interfered after installed most of dash cams, this kit will help you solve this problem.

【Everything is Prepared for You】We have upgraded it to a total length of 4.0 meters. It come with all needed install tools, and wire connectors at all cable connections makes installation easier and firmer. Also a detailed instruction provided in package.

productInformation.value: #278,236 in Electronics (See Top 100 in Electronics) #2,083 in Car On-Dash Mounted Cameras

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear installation instructions and
reviews.reviewText: When ordering this kit I expected to watch YouTube instruction videos on how to install similar products in order to understand how to properly put this in my vehicle. Instead, I was pleasantly surprised when the included instructions were very detailed and in passable English. They even included a clear explanation of the types of fuses included with the fuse taps in the kit. I was able to install two of these kits in about an hour with the majority of that time taken up with understanding how to disassemble my glove compartment to access the fuse box. If you are looking to install low amperage USB-powered devices in your car or truck I recommend this kit. It has been in my car for around a month and has worked consistently at every start.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good but tiny flaw
reviews.reviewText: As others have said ground terminal needed recrimped, other than that great cable and helps achieve a very clean install

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great kit, has all the connections you need to eliminate aux power cords that get in the way.
reviews.reviewText: I have always hard wired in my camera's and other items to eliminate those unsightly cords that run for these type of accessories. This kit had every thing I normally buy to install in a fashion that is professional and looks factory, one package and no hunting for all the right things, sign me up. So needless to say, after the first install using this package, I am buying more for future use and to have handy for friends, relatives, or my own installs. Quality and fitment very good, no complaints at all, just true satisfaction and happy that someone put this together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This kit came with everything I needed to install my new dash cam and hide the wires! Adapters, a lengthy cord, fuses for the dash cam, and a tool to help pry off car parts.The fuse wire and power cable are plug-n-play. Didn't even need a wire crimping tool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked at first then bluescreened
reviews.reviewText: Do not recommend this camera it malfunctioned in less than a year and I cannot get a refund or replacement, but the install went well, just isn't worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It looked promising when it arrived. It came with multiple connectors, fuses, etc. The install was very easy using a fuse tap and it worked for a total of about one hour in a car that is occasionally driven. All of a sudden, the camera would not charge using this hard-wired cable. The camera was tested and works perfectly (it is new) using the original power adapter. I checked the fuse for this kit and it was not blown. Removed the cable and found that it felt broken in 3 places. This was carefully installed and no sharp corners were encountered. The cable went from above the rearview, across the top of the headliner, down the A-Pillar, to an interior fusebox located in the kick panel. This was a straight forward install that took 15 minutes with no reason for the cable to have broken. THIS CABLE IS FLIMSY AT BEST. DO NOT BUY THIS...THIS IS COMPLETE GARBAGE.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Many flaws. But works.
reviews.reviewText: Instructions are kind of vague when it comes to the finer details. If your new to wiring a dash cam in your car, the video on youtube for wiring isn't the best. The fuse tap comes with a 3amp fuse. It just blew right away. So you might want a bigger fuse with it. The tap also was flipped on the accessory fuse port. it doesn't say that upfront in the instructions. But the pictures shown that way and in my case my fuse tap was that way..(It doesn't include a circuit tester for fuse orientation testing so you will need one of those too) There's no cable ties either so you will need to provide those or figure something out. They provided enough cable to have a lot to spare, so that was nice. Mine also had a bad ground connection. They used a needle thin ground wire and it wasn't even spliced enough to make contact with the screw clip. So you may have to splice that when you hook your ground up and it doesn't work.. overall. You pay for what you get. Its alright for the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good Hardwire Kit, description is a little off
reviews.reviewText: This kit is good value for the price and has just about everything you need to hardwire your dashcam. The only problem I had with it was it stated that you get a mini to micro usb adapter but it was actually a mini to usb-c adapter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Item arrived very quick. and also is made of good quality materials. Gives you all the instructions, all you need is a little bit of imagination when it comes to install it. VERY happy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Use it for my 2x dash-cam installation.Nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: This hardwire kit does as it says on the tin.
reviews.reviewText: Simple enough to install after watching a couple of videos

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not sure if it the car I drive, however when using the hard wire kit every time the start stop function operates the camera stops. You then need to start the camera manually. That’s when connected to the fuse box on a fuse controlled by the Ignition. If you wire it to a fuse with a 24/7 supply like I tried the next day I had a battery drain warning. If you can I’d stick to the 12volt socket supplied.
